column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Conveniently located at the end of Millenium Park
column2: I wandered into the Art Institute of Chicago and used my Chicago CityPass for expedited entry. Love it. Though there were various school / class groups in the museum on the morning I visited (Thursday
column4: the museum is large enough that it wasn't a huge disturbance (unless they were yelling or running around one of the halls - but that was minimal).
